How to Qualify for a Loan

Ready to make that purchase? Here are some requirements before you apply for a loan:

Filipino Citizen

Must be a Filipino citizen, age 18 - 68 years old.

Primary ID

Must have one primary ID that contains your current address.

List of Valid IDs

Source Of Income

Must have an income from reliable sources such as employment, business, pension, and remittances.

Customers with ongoing loans are qualified

Existing customers with ending loans can re-apply.
